comment: Professor Famuyiwa is the BEST! I literally failed my first test in the class but still managed to get an A!! Definitely take this class, only the final has lockdown and you get a lot of points doing the discussions

Professor Fumi teaches the material well and responds to emails quickly. class us once a week and usually assigns an easy in-class "Q&A" midway through the lecture. 11 quizzes, 3 tests (all open note and online), a group project, and an optional final. Excel knowledge will carry you through this class. He also drops the two lowest quiz grades :)

Professor Famuyiwa is a solid choice for a professor. I took his hybrid class, which was graded by three tests (online and open-note ), 7 Quizzes (online and open-note) and one group project. The final was optional. I definitely recommend!

Professor Femi is great his class is a hybrid so you attend class once a week, you have a quiz every week and 3 tests, with an optional final that replaces your lowest test grade. All quizzes and tests are online. Knowing how to use excel is a bonus and makes the class even easier. Overall great teacher.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Group projects--Clear grading criteria
